name: Rise
info: A Sinner adept at Physical Output. Deals 5% more Damage, and another 5% more for enemies with broken Cores.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Vanguard of Revolt
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: After enemies take damage from [Punishment Imposed] or [Evil Conduct Elimination], the damage Rise deals to them will be increased by 10% / 15% / 20%, lasting for 8 seconds, the effect stacking up to 3 times.

ecbFlavourText: "There's no need to endure any longer... I finally have the power in my hands to set everything right."

maniaIntensify.title: TBA
maniaIntensify.text: Deals 10% more Damage, and another 10% for enemies with broken Cores.

shackles.title: Furious Determination
shackles.description: Up to 3 [Light Swords] can exist on-field.

shackles.title: Emotional Resonance
shackles.description: Energy Consumption of [Punishment Imposed] reduced by 3 points.

media.title: [Eng CC] 2nd Anniversary A-rank Fury | Rise "Nirvana Intern" Character Trailer
media.author: Jiu Jiu subs

skills.name: Light Slash
skills.description: Rise uses a lightsabre to attack, each hit dealing (Attack * 96%) Physical Damage.

skills.name: Punishment Imposed
skills.description:
Rise throws out her weapon, dealing (Attack * 198%) Physical Damage to all enemies in the designated grid, leaving 1 [Light Sword] behind.
Up to 2 [Light Sword]s can exist on-field at the same time.
[Punishment Imposed] can be charged up to 3 times.

When Rise moves to the grid that [Light Sword] is on, she will pick up the [Light Sword] and deal (Attack * 242%) Physical Damage to all enemies within a 3x3 area.

upgrade.description: Damage coefficient increases to $0%. Damage coefficient increases to $0%.

skills.name: Evil Conduct Elimination
skills.description: Unlocks second Ultimate, [Evil Conduct Elimination]. Rise teleports to and detonates all [Light Sword]s on field, dealing (Attack * 429%) Physical Damage to all enemies within 3x3 area of each [Light Sword], as well as 1 Core Damage.

skills.name: Numerical Light Blade
skills.description: After Rise picks up [Light Sword], her next Normal Attack damage is increased by 130%. After Rise detonates [Light Sword], her next Normal Attack damage is increased by 208%.

upgrade.description: After picking up, the next normal attack damage bonus increases to $0%. After detonating, the next normal attack damage bonus increases to $0%.

criminalRecord: The subject attended school at a prestigious Eastside establishment, later joining Nirvana as an intern, and was the sole survivor of the unexplained terrorist attack on Nirvana. Upon investigation, it was discovered that the subject had major conflict at work with the other victims of the attack, and during their internship, the subject allegedly displayed violent tendencies. Therefore, the possibility that the subject had involvement in this crime cannot be ruled out.
mutationAssessment: The subject's ability is [Numerical Light Blade]. The subject is able to extract data from themselves or a network and transform it into a weapon, with a lightsabre being its most common form. It is able to cause great physical destruction within a short period of time.
